name: pineapple

B1 (the yellow flesh and juice of) a large tropical fruit with a rough orange or brown skin and pointed leaves on top: tinned pineapples pineapple juice

a large, juicy fruit that grows in hotter regions, having a rough skin, a short stem, and pointed leaves on the top, or its sweet, yellow flesh
